Content:
# Minecraft Server Web Management Panel

**[‰∏≠ÊñáÁâàÊú¨ (Chinese Version)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ckfanzhe/minecraft-easyserver/main/docs/README_CN.md)**

A **lightweight** Minecraft server web management panel with modern UI and comprehensive server management features.

**Currently Supported Servers:**
- ‚úÖ Minecraft Bedrock Server
- Minecraft Java Server

## üöÄ Features

### üåç Minecraft Server Download
- **Server Download** Support for downloading specific server versions directly from the management page
- **Server Version Switching** Support for one-click server version switching

### üéÆ Server Control
- **One-click Start/Stop/Restart** Minecraft Bedrock server
- **Real-time Status Monitoring** Display server running status

### ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration Management
- **Support for all major configuration options**:
  - Server name and description
  - Game mode (Survival/Creative/Adventure)
  - Difficulty settings (Peaceful/Easy/Normal/Hard)
  - Maximum player count
  - Server port configuration
  - Cheats and whitelist toggles
- **Server Configuration File Management** Automatically maintains `server.properties` file

### üë• Whitelist Management
- **Add/Remove Players** Manage the list of players allowed to join the server
- **Whitelist File Management** Automatically maintains `allowlist.json` file

### üõ°Ô∏è Permission Management
- **Three-tier Permission System**:
  - **Visitor** - Basic game permissions
  - **Member** - Standard player permissions
  - **Operator** - Full administrative permissions
- **Player Permission Settings** Assign permission levels to specific players
Translation:
# Panneau de Gestion Web pour Serveur Minecraft

**[ÁâàÊú¨‰∏≠ÊñáÁâà (Version Chinoise)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ckfanzhe/minecraft-easyserver/main/docs/README_CN.md)**

Un panneau de gestion web **l√©ger** pour serveur Minecraft avec une interface moderne et des fonctionnalit√©s compl√®tes de gestion de serveur.

**Serveurs actuellement pris en charge :**
- ‚úÖ Serveur Minecraft Bedrock
- Serveur Minecraft Java

## üöÄ Fonctionnalit√©s

### üåç T√©l√©chargement du Serveur Minecraft
- **T√©l√©chargement du Serveur** Prise en charge du t√©l√©chargement des versions sp√©cifiques du serveur directement depuis la page de gestion
- **Changement de Version du Serveur** Prise en charge du changement de version du serveur en un clic

### üéÆ Contr√¥le du Serveur
- **D√©marrage/Arr√™t/Red√©marrage en un clic** du serveur Minecraft Bedrock
- **Surveillance en Temps R√©el** Affichage de l‚Äô√©tat de fonctionnement du serveur

### ‚öôÔ∏è Gestion de la Configuration
- **Prise en charge de toutes les options majeures de configuration** :
  - Nom et description du serveur
  - Mode de jeu (Survie/Cr√©atif/Aventure)
  - R√©glages de la difficult√© (Paisible/Faible/Normal/Difficile)
  - Nombre maximum de joueurs
  - Configuration du port du serveur
  - Bascules pour triches et liste blanche
- **Gestion automatique du fichier de configuration serveur** Maintient automatiquement le fichier `server.properties`

### üë• Gestion de la Liste Blanche
- **Ajout/Suppression de joueurs** G√©rer la liste des joueurs autoris√©s √† rejoindre le serveur
- **Gestion du fichier liste blanche** Maintient automatiquement le fichier `allowlist.json`

### üõ°Ô∏è Gestion des Permissions
- **Syst√®me de permissions √† trois niveaux** :
  - **Visiteur** - Permissions de jeu basiques
  - **Membre** - Permissions standards du joueur
  - **Op√©rateur** - Permissions administratives compl√®tes
- **Param√®tres des permissions des joueurs** Attribution de niveaux de permission √† des joueurs sp√©cifiques

Content:
- **Permission File Management** Automatically maintains `permissions.json` file

### üåç World Management
- **World File Upload** Support for `.zip` and `.mcworld` formats with automatic extraction
- **World Switching** One-click activation of different worlds
- **World Deletion** Safe deletion of unwanted world files
- **Current World Identification** Clear display of the currently active world

### üåç Resource Pack Management
- **Resource File Upload** Support for `.zip` and `.mcpack` formats
- **Resource Activation** One-click activation of different resource packs
- **Resource Deletion** Safe deletion of unwanted resource packs

### üìã Server Logs
- **Real-time Log Viewing** Monitor Minecraft server logs in real-time through the web interface
- **Auto-scroll** Option to automatically scroll to the latest log entries

### üíª Command Execution
- **Direct Command Input** Execute Minecraft server commands directly from the web interface
- **Command History** View and reuse previously executed commands
- **Quick Commands** Access frequently used commands through categorized quick access buttons

### üîê Authentication & Security
- **Login System** Secure access to the management panel with password authentication
- **Session Management** Automatic session handling with secure token-based authentication
- **Access Control** Protect server management functions from unauthorized access



## üìã System Requirements

### Server Environment
- **Operating System**: Windows 10+ or Ubuntu 18.04+ (Linux)
- **Memory**: At least 2GB RAM
- **Storage**: At least 10GB available space
- **Network**: Open ports 8080 (management panel) and 19132 (Minecraft server)

## üõ†Ô∏è Installation Guide

### Quick Start (Recommended)
Translation:
- **Gestion des fichiers de permissions** Maintient automatiquement le fichier `permissions.json`

### üåç Gestion des mondes
- **T√©l√©versement de fichiers monde** Support des formats `.zip` et `.mcworld` avec extraction automatique
- **Changement de monde** Activation en un clic de diff√©rents mondes
- **Suppression de monde** Suppression s√©curis√©e des fichiers monde ind√©sirables
- **Identification du monde actuel** Affichage clair du monde actuellement actif

### üåç Gestion des packs de ressources
- **T√©l√©versement de fichiers ressources** Support des formats `.zip` et `.mcpack`
- **Activation des ressources** Activation en un clic de diff√©rents packs de ressources
- **Suppression des ressources** Suppression s√©curis√©e des packs de ressources ind√©sirables

### üìã Journaux du serveur
- **Affichage des logs en temps r√©el** Surveillance des journaux du serveur Minecraft en temps r√©el via l‚Äôinterface web
- **D√©filement automatique** Option pour d√©filer automatiquement vers les derni√®res entr√©es de log

### üíª Ex√©cution de commandes
- **Saisie directe de commandes** Ex√©cutez les commandes du serveur Minecraft directement depuis l‚Äôinterface web
- **Historique des commandes** Visualisez et r√©utilisez les commandes pr√©c√©demment ex√©cut√©es
- **Commandes rapides** Acc√®s aux commandes fr√©quemment utilis√©es via des boutons d‚Äôacc√®s rapide cat√©goris√©s

### üîê Authentification & S√©curit√©
- **Syst√®me de connexion** Acc√®s s√©curis√© au panneau de gestion par authentification par mot de passe
- **Gestion des sessions** Gestion automatique des sessions avec authentification s√©curis√©e par jeton
- **Contr√¥le d‚Äôacc√®s** Protection des fonctions de gestion du serveur contre les acc√®s non autoris√©s

## üìã Exigences syst√®me

### Environnement serveur
- **Syst√®me d‚Äôexploitation** : Windows 10+ ou Ubuntu 18.04+ (Linux)
- **M√©moire** : Au moins 2 Go de RAM
- **Stockage** : Au moins 10 Go d‚Äôespace disponible
- **R√©seau** : Ports 8080 (panneau de gestion) et 19132 (serveur Minecraft) ouverts

## üõ†Ô∏è Guide d‚Äôinstallation

### D√©marrage rapide (recommand√©)

Content:
1. **Download Pre-built Release**:
   - Download the appropriate version for your operating system from the [Releases](https://github.com/ckfanzhe/bedrock-easy-server/releases) page
   - `minecraft-server-manager-windows.exe` for Windows
   - `minecraft-server-manager-linux` for Linux

2. **Run the Application**:
Translation:
1. **T√©l√©charger la version pr√©compil√©e** :
   - T√©l√©chargez la version appropri√©e pour votre syst√®me d'exploitation depuis la page [Releases](https://github.com/ckfanzhe/bedrock-easy-server/releases)
   - `minecraft-server-manager-windows.exe` pour Windows
   - `minecraft-server-manager-linux` pour Linux

2. **Lancer l'application** :

RowTranslations.translatedContent: - T√©l√©chargez la version appropri√©e pour votre syst√®me d'exploitation depuis la page [Releases](https://github.com/ckfanzhe/bedrock-easy-server/releases)

RowTranslations.originContent: - Download the appropriate version for your operating system from the [Releases](https://github.com/ckfanzhe/bedrock-easy-server/releases) page

Content:
```bash
   # For Linux
   chmod +x minecraft-server-manager-linux
   ./minecraft-server-manager-linux
   
   # For Windows
   minecraft-server-manager-windows.exe
   ```
Translation:
```bash
   # For Linux
   chmod +x minecraft-server-manager-linux
   ./minecraft-server-manager-linux
   
   # For Windows
   minecraft-server-manager-windows.exe
   ```

Content:
### Docker Deployment

1. **Using Docker directly (Recommended)**:
Translation:
### D√©ploiement Docker

1. **Utilisation directe de Docker (Recommand√©)** :

Content:
```bash
   # Create data directory for persistent storage
   mkdir -p data
   
   # Run the container using the published image
   docker run -d \
     --name minecraft-easyserver \
     -p 8080:8080 \
     -p 19132:19132/udp \
     -p 19133:19133/udp \
     -v ./data:/data/bedrock-server \
     -v ./config:/data/config \
     ifanzhe/minecraft-easyserver:latest
   ```
Translation:
```bash
   # Create data directory for persistent storage
   mkdir -p data
   
   # Run the container using the published image
   docker run -d \
     --name minecraft-easyserver \
     -p 8080:8080 \
     -p 19132:19132/udp \
     -p 19133:19133/udp \
     -v ./data:/data/bedrock-server \
     -v ./config:/data/config \
     ifanzhe/minecraft-easyserver:latest
   ```

RowTranslations.originContent: # Create data directory for persistent storage
RowTranslations.translatedContent: # Create data directory for persistent storage

RowTranslations.originContent: # Run the container using the published image
RowTranslations.translatedContent: # Run the container using the published image

Content: 2. **Using Docker Compose**:
Translation: 2. **Utilisation de Docker Compose** :

Content:
```bash
   # Create docker-compose.yml file
   cat > docker-compose.yml << EOF
   version: '3.8'
   services:
     minecraft-server-manager:
       image: ifanzhe/minecraft-easyserver:latest
       container_name: minecraft-easyserver
       ports:
         - "8080:8080"
         - "19132:19132/udp"
         - "19133:19133/udp"
       volumes:
         - ./data:/data/bedrock-server
         - ./config:/data/config
       environment:
         - TZ=Asia/Shanghai
       restart: unless-stopped
       healthcheck:
         test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8080"]
         interval: 30s
         timeout: 10s
         retries: 3
   EOF
   
   # Start with Docker Compose
   docker-compose up -d
   ```
Translation:
```bash
   # Create docker-compose.yml file
   cat > docker-compose.yml << EOF
   version: '3.8'
   services:
     minecraft-server-manager:
       image: ifanzhe/minecraft-easyserver:latest
       container_name: minecraft-easyserver
       ports:
         - "8080:8080"
         - "19132:19132/udp"
         - "19133:19133/udp"
       volumes:
         - ./data:/data/bedrock-server
         - ./config:/data/config
       environment:
         - TZ=Asia/Shanghai
       restart: unless-stopped
       healthcheck:
         test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8080"]
         interval: 30s
         timeout: 10s
         retries: 3
   EOF
   
   # Start with Docker Compose
   docker-compose up -d
   ```

Content:
3. **Access the application**:
   - Open browser and visit: `http://localhost:8080`
   - Server data will be persisted in the `./data` directory

### Build from Source (For Developers)

1. **Prerequisites**: 
   - Go 1.21 or higher
   - Node.js 16+ and npm (for frontend compilation)

2. **Clone Repository**:
Translation:
3. **Acc√©der √† l'application** :
   - Ouvrez le navigateur et visitez : `http://localhost:8080`
   - Les donn√©es du serveur seront sauvegard√©es dans le r√©pertoire `./data`

### Compiler depuis la source (pour les d√©veloppeurs)

1. **Pr√©requis** : 
   - Go 1.21 ou sup√©rieur
   - Node.js 16+ et npm (pour la compilation du frontend)

2. **Cloner le d√©p√¥t** :

RowTranslations.originContent: - Server data will be persisted in the `./data` directory
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Les donn√©es du serveur seront sauvegard√©es dans le r√©pertoire `./data`
### Compiler depuis la source (pour les d√©veloppeurs)
- Node.js 16+ et npm (pour la compilation du frontend)

Content:
```bash
   git clone https://github.com/ckfanzhe/bedrock-easy-server.git
   cd minecraft-easy-server
   ```
Translation:
```bash
   git clone https://github.com/ckfanzhe/bedrock-easy-server.git
   cd minecraft-easy-server
   ```

Content: 3. **Build All Platforms (Recommended)**:
Translation: 3. **Construire toutes les plateformes (Recommand√©)** :

Content:
```bash
   chmod +x build.sh
   ./build.sh
   ```
Translation:
```bash
   chmod +x build.sh
   ./build.sh
   ```

Content:
This script will:
   - Install frontend dependencies (`npm install`)
   - Build the Vue.js frontend (`npm run build`)
   - Copy built assets to the embed directory
   - Compile Go binaries for all platforms with embedded frontend

4. **Manual Build Steps** (if you prefer step-by-step):
Translation:
Ce script va¬†:
   - Installer les d√©pendances frontend (`npm install`)
   - Compiler le frontend Vue.js (`npm run build`)
   - Copier les assets compil√©s dans le r√©pertoire embed
   - Compiler les binaires Go pour toutes les plateformes avec le frontend int√©gr√©

4. **√âtapes de construction manuelle** (si vous pr√©f√©rez √©tape par √©tape)¬†:

RowTranslations.originContent: - Build the Vue.js frontend (`npm run build`)
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Compiler le frontend Vue.js (`npm run build`)

RowTranslations.originContent: - Copy built assets to the embed directory
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Copier les assets compil√©s dans le r√©pertoire embed

RowTranslations.originContent: - Compile Go binaries for all platforms with embedded frontend
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Compiler les binaires Go pour toutes les plateformes avec le frontend int√©gr√©
4. **√âtapes de construction manuelle** (si vous pr√©f√©rez √©tape par √©tape)¬†:

Content:
```bash
   # Build frontend first
   cd minecraft-easyserver-web
   npm install
   npm run build
   cd ..
   
   # Copy frontend build output
   rm -rf web/*
   cp -r minecraft-easyserver-web/dist/* web/
   
   # Build Go binary
   go build -o minecraft-server-manager
   ```
Translation:
```bash
   # Build frontend first
   cd minecraft-easyserver-web
   npm install
   npm run build
   cd ..
   
   # Copy frontend build output
   rm -rf web/*
   cp -r minecraft-easyserver-web/dist/* web/
   
   # Build Go binary
   go build -o minecraft-server-manager
   ```

Content:
**Note**: The build process now includes frontend compilation using webpack, which bundles all Vue.js components, styles, and assets into optimized files that are then embedded into the Go binary for single-file deployment.

## üöÄ Usage Guide

### Start Management Panel

1. **Run the Application**:
Translation:
**Note** : Le processus de construction inclut d√©sormais la compilation frontend avec webpack, qui regroupe tous les composants Vue.js, styles et ressources en fichiers optimis√©s, lesquels sont ensuite int√©gr√©s dans le binaire Go pour un d√©ploiement en un seul fichier.

### D√©marrer le panneau de gestion

1. **Lancer l'application** :

   - Open browser and visit: `http://localhost:8080`

## üî• Firewall Configuration

### Windows Firewall
On some systems, when you wish to connect to the server using a client running on the same machine as the server is running on, you will need to exempt the Minecraft client from UWP loopback restrictions:
Translation:
2. **Interface de gestion d'acc√®s** :
   - Ouvrez le navigateur et rendez-vous sur : `http://localhost:8080`
   - Le panneau de gestion se chargera automatiquement

## üî• Configuration du pare-feu

### Pare-feu Windows
Sur certains syst√®mes, lorsque vous souhaitez vous connecter au serveur √† l‚Äôaide d‚Äôun client fonctionnant sur la m√™me machine que le serveur, vous devrez exempt√© le client Minecraft des restrictions UWP de loopback :

RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Ouvrez le navigateur et rendez-vous sur : `http://localhost:8080`

RowTranslations.originContent: - The management panel will load automatically
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - Le panneau de gestion se chargera automatiquement

RowTranslations.originContent: On some systems, when you wish to connect to the server using a client running on the same machine as the server is running on, you will need to exempt the Minecraft client from UWP loopback restrictions:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Sur certains syst√®mes, lorsque vous souhaitez vous connecter au serveur √† l‚Äôaide d‚Äôun client fonctionnant sur la m√™me machine que le serveur, vous devrez exempt√© le client Minecraft des restrictions UWP de loopback :

Content:
Ensure the following ports are open in the firewall:
- **8080**: Management panel access port
- **19132**: Minecraft Bedrock server default port
- **19133**: Minecraft Bedrock server IPv6 port

## üìù Additional Information

### TODO Planned Features
- ‚úÖ Support for one-click mcpackage mod import
- ‚úÖ Linux operating system support
- ‚úÖ Real-time Bedrock server log viewing
- ‚úÖ Direct command execution to Bedrock server through web interface
- üîÑ Player online status monitoring
- ‚úÖ Server performance monitoring
- üîÑ Automatic world backup functionality
- ‚úÖ Multi-language interface support
- üîÑ Java Server Support - Support for Minecraft Java Edition servers
- ‚úÖ Docker Support - Containerized deployment support

## ü§ù Contributing

Welcome to submit issue reports, feature suggestions, and code contributions!

### Development Environment Setup
1. Fork the project repository
2. Create a feature branch: `git checkout -b feature/new-feature`
3. Commit changes: `git commit -am 'Add new feature'`
4. Push branch: `git push origin feature/new-feature`
5. Create Pull Request

### Code Standards
- Use Go standard code formatting
- Add appropriate comments and documentation
- Ensure code passes tests
- Follow the project's architectural patterns
